name: The Orphan Sock
description:
Web playable version: The Orphan Sock - Web Build

Your goal is to collect THE ONLY ONE sock that don't have a match! There is one per level!  

You can match and fold the pairs but it takes more time than dispatching them away....

This game has been made in 48 hours for the gmtk-2019 gamejam!

An online leaderboard is accessible from the main menu allowing you to compare your skills with others ;)

Other productions from the same team:

GameJams

Rebound: a Puzzle Adventure (our first mobile indie game)
